record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3535
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3535 -- (Senate - September 22, 2008)

[Page: S9220]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand there is a bill at the desk. I now ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for the first time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 3535) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to index certain assets for purposes of determining gain or loss.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for its second reading--I do that in order to place the bill on the calendar under the provisions of rule XIV--and I object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be read for the second time on the next legislative day.
